Articles.Content:
I have a macbook pro retina with 16gb ram and i7 four core. Since ksp 0.25 the game crashes all the time. It got worse after 0.90

What should I do? This is my favorite game to play. But has now become unplayable. Here is the crash log :

Process: KSP [9749]

Path: /Users/USER/Library/Application Support/Steam/*/KSP.app/Contents/MacOS/KSP

Identifier: unity.Squad.Kerbal Space Program

Version: Unity Player version 4.5.3p2 (4.5.3p2)

Code Type: X86 (Native)

Parent Process: ??? [1]

Responsible: KSP [9749]

User ID: 501

Date/Time: 2014-12-13 16:19:49.898 +0100

OS Version: Mac OS X 10.10.1 (14B25)

Report Version: 11

Anonymous UUID: 9DADAFE5-8D23-4208-E9DE-6D85CF2F2520

Sleep/Wake UUID: AE428DF9-9CAE-4B42-B2C8-35155D44DFA3

Time Awake Since Boot: 250000 seconds

Time Since Wake: 2300 seconds

Crashed Thread: 0 MainThrd Dispatch queue: com.apple.main-thread

Exception Type: EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGSEGV)

Exception Codes: KERN_PROTECTION_FAILURE at 0x00000000bf7ffffc

VM Regions Near 0xbf7ffffc:

VM_ALLOCATE 00000000bbffe000-00000000bc000000 [ 8K] rw-/rwx SM=SHM

--> Stack 00000000bc000000-00000000bf800000 [ 56.0M] ---/rwx SM=NUL

Stack 00000000bf800000-00000000c0000000 [ 8192K] rw-/rwx SM=COW

Thread 0 Crashed:: MainThrd Dispatch queue: com.apple.main-thread

0 unity.Squad.Kerbal Space Program 0x00361f44 ScriptingObjectOfType<Object>::IsValidObjectReference() const + 20

1 unity.Squad.Kerbal Space Program 0x0036063e Scripting::CompareBaseObjects(MonoObject*, MonoObject*) + 46

2 unity.Squad.Kerbal Space Program 0x00464dc8 Object_CUSTOM_CompareBaseObjectsInternal(ScriptingObjectOfType<Object>, ScriptingObjectOfType<Object>) + 24
